hLDA 0.1.0

    Visualizes the Topic Hierarchy of a Fitted hLDA Model

    plot_hLDA_hierarchy.Rd

    Visualizes the Topic Hierarchy of a Fitted hLDA Model

    plot_hLDA_hierarchy(hLDA_model, direction = "h", color_by = "path")

    Arguments

    hLDA_model

    (required, hLDA.model) object returned by hLDA.

    direction

    (optional, character, default = "h") whether the hierarchy should be displayed vertically ("v") or horizontally ("h").

    color_by

    (optional, character, default = "path") specifies the variable that should be used for coloring the visualization.

    Value

    A ggplot2 object describing the sample composition.

    See also

    plot_hLDA

    Examples

    x <- matrix(sample(0:100, 1000, replace = TRUE), 20, 50)
m <- hLDA(x, depth = 3)
#> Warning: The column names (the features) were not provided.
#>              Replacing them with 'w1'...'w50'
plot_hLDA_hierarchy(m)
